name: COL
label: Collaboration required
definition: Requestor must agree to collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).

name: DS
label: Disease-specific research and clinical care
definition: Use of the data must be related to [disease].

name: GRU
label: General research use and clinical care
definition: For health/medical/biomedical purposes, including the study of population origins or ancestry.

name: GS
label: Geographical restrictions
definition: Use of the data is limited to within [geographic region].

name: GSO
label: Genetic studies only
definition: Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only (i.e., no phenotype-only research).

name: HMB
label: Health/medical/biomedical research and clinical care
definition: Use of the data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes; does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.

name: IRB
label: Ethics approval required
definition: Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB/REC approval.

name: IS
label: Institution-specific restrictions
definition: Use of data is limited to use within an approved institution.

name: MOR
label: Publication moratorium/embargo
definition: Requestor agrees not to publish results of studies until [date].

name: NMDS
label: No general methods research
definition: Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms) ONLY within the bounds of other data use limitations.

name: NPU
label: Not-for-profit use only
definition: Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

name: POA
label: Population origins/ancestry research
definition: Use of the data is limited to the study of population origins or ancestry.

name: PS
label: Project-specific restrictions
definition: Use of data is limited to use within an approved project.

name: PUB
label: Publication required
definition: Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.

name: RS
label: Oher research-specific restrictions
definition: Use of the data is limited to studies of [research type] (e.g., pediatric research).

name: RUO
label: Research use only
definition: Use of data is limited to research purposes (e.g., does not include its use in clinical care).

name: TS
label: Time limits on use
definition: Use of data is approved for [x months].

name: US
label: User-specific restrictions
definition: Use of data is limited to use by approved users.
